===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# A greyish-blue powder used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] to "cool the liver and lung, keep the ''adverse [[qi]]'' downwards, ease the mind when there is ''heat of liver and lung'', dizziness, tinnitus, cough, epistaxis, haemoptysis, lung abscess, obstruction of pharynx and diaphragm, thirst, and dysphoria".

Daige powder contain the following ingredients:
